siteMetadata.title: Ghost Docs
siteMetadata.description: Everything you need to know about working with the Ghost professional publishing platform.

frontmatter.title: How to install Ghost locally
frontmatter.meta_title: How to install Ghost locally on Mac, PC or Linux
frontmatter.meta_description: A detailed local install guide for how to install the Ghost publishing platform on your computer running Mac, PC or Linux. Ideal for Ghost theme development.
